column5: Gas company's won't like this  , I herd yesterday on the radio, a guy is running his car on compressed air, getting 100 kilo/hr. I'd like to see the tank. Sounds like a good idea  .

I saw that on a cable channel once. cant remember which one. Looked pretty cool. I think they were testing in Asia on Fork lift's in busy market areas to cut down on emmisions in enclosed area's. I think this is the one I saw..  http://www.theaircar.com/  Not to hijack the thread but.... I also was just talking to a guy that said if you put acetone into your gas you pick up about 15%  to 20% increase in gas mileage.... VERY SMALL AMOUNT. something like 1 or 2 oz per 10 gallons. it works as a wetting agent and lets your gas vaporize better and hence is more efficient use of your gas.
Suuure thing, I've heard that if you eat a lot of beans you can stick a hose up your a... and re route it to the air intake and get 50% better mileage.  I've got a turbo air thingy for you too.
Thanks Skiel, no problem. For the bean thing, bean sales just went up  , good one.
